tagline.text: Your time is your health. Your health is your life

hero.headline: Sistaimu: Own Your Health, Time, and Life!
hero.subheadline: From daily wellbeing rhythms to life milestones, Sistaimu helps you track your health, work, and personal growth — bringing clarity and balance every day.

about.description_about: Sistaimu is your daily timeline management tool — bridging life and work with clarity and control. Inspired by real needs, it serves its creators before it serves the world.
about.quote_about: "We aren’t working for invisible goals. We are building Sistaimu by using Sistaimu."

features_about.title: Own Your Future
features_about.description: Today you control your work data. Tomorrow you control your whole life stream.

features_about.title: Empowerment in Compliance
features_about.description: You are not forced to report to the system. You are empowered to own your data — and share it when required.

features_about.title: Your Data is Protected
features_about.description: Your data is your power. Sistaimu protects it as fiercely as you protect your future.

features_about.title: Automation You Can Trust
features_about.description: Sistaimu could automate this beautifully. No more panicking over spreadsheets before an inspection.

features_about.title: Your Personal Growth Map
features_about.description: When you see your life clearly, you live it fully. Sistaimu turns invisible patterns into your personal growth map.

features_about.title: Your Choices Build Your Destiny
features_about.description: Your future isn’t random. It’s built from the choices you track today. Sistaimu helps you navigate the unknown with confidence.

dashboard.title: Welcome to your Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your workspaces, schedules, and life commits!
dashboard.workspacesDescription: Start by creating your first workspace to track projects and milestones.
dashboard.timelineDescription: Your life commits and events will appear here.

workspace.title: Timeline
workspace.message: We're currently laying the foundation for this page. Check back soon!

timeline.title: Workspaces
timeline.message: Soon you will be able to track your life commits and milestones here. Stay tuned as we build your future step by step!

accessibilityPreview.title: Accessibility Preview
accessibilityPreview.description: This text reflects your selected accessibility mode.
